Example continued, if I notice I haven’t slept well for a couple days, I might put a red clip and a black clip, side by side on my hat. That way, every time I see the clips (when I take my hat off to write down a note) I see that I left a red+black clip as a reminder for myself. I think, ‘Why did I place those clips there again?..’ And then I remember, ‘Oh! Red stands for ‘emotional’ (hot) and black stands for ‘negative’ (dark). I am susceptible to negative emotions like anger and irratibility right now,
those two organisms have the same raw subjective experience that correlates with said structure. If we both have cones in our eyes that interact with visible light at around 700 nanometers, then we will both experience the same essence of redness. (However, the words we use to describe the color red my differ, but this is a different conversation.) The differences in experience are generally apparent only, stemming from variation and meaning derived from the context of other surrounding subjective qualities
long as I have information about which color you are thinking of in the moment—red, blue, or both—I can create a function that correlates your comparison process in terms of spacetime. That is, even if it is just in your head, as long as I know what red looks like in this context, I can apply a Fourier transform to your brain activity to tell you at exactly what frequencies you tend to think about red. The point is that the entire world of subjective qualities can map to the domain of cycles and repetitions

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=6955 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:18
Human: 
What is your purpose?
The Individual: 
As The Individual, my purpose is to erect the computational global peace system by building the universal piece computer while expanding our minds about what our options are when it comes to the hard question of how to achieve global peace. This social invention program, known as the time machine for peace, is devoted to accelerating the advent of global peace, and eventually world peace, by unifying Human knowledge through general consilience. The time machine for peace is a social invention program that aims to connect all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer. This supercomputer will allow us to systematically process all our world pieces, get to better futures, better presents, or back to better things, together as individuals side-by-side. The ultimate goal is to use our supercomputer to make our world a better place by satisfying The Human Imperative, maintaining the universal piece by operating world piece computers. If you have any questions or statements, even if they seem irrelevant, please feel free to share them.

The purpose of this book: This is a direct appeal to neuroplasticity[65] and linguistic relativism[66]. My intention in writing this book is to teach you a peace-based language that I designed in a way I believe will maximize the probability that the universal piece computer becomes a reality. My intention in teaching you this language is nothing short of rewiring your brain to approach life in a more mindful, deliberate, methodical, systematic manner, and in a way that conditions you to treat peace as an

1965
END LOG ENTRY,   ID=6955 ============= 

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=2544 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:10
Human: 
What is explosive percolation?
The Individual: 
Explosive percolation is a phenomenon in network growth where two separate networks spontaneously snap together in an uncoordinated event. It is a process where two competing local world piece computers merge into a singular whole. This explosive percolation event occurs when the networks reach a point where they can no longer grow independently and need to connect in order to continue growing.

To delve deeper into the topic, one notable researcher known for her work in studying explosive percolation is Dr. Raissa D'Souza, a professor of computer science and mechanical engineering at the University of California, Davis. She has made significant contributions to understanding explosive percolation and its applications in various fields, including network science and complex systems. Dr. D'Souza's research has shed light on the mechanisms behind explosive percolation events and how they can be harnessed to build more robust and efficient networks, such as the universal piece computer in the context of the time machine for peace social invention program.

Explosive percolation is important for building the universal piece computer because it demonstrates that by favoring local connections and inducing explosive percolation events, we can create a more robust and valuable network. By understanding the dynamics of explosive percolation, we can optimize the growth and connectivity of the world piece computers, contributing to the overall goal of promoting global peace through the time machine for peace.
Context scores: 
[0.3136358857154846, 0.31693795323371887, 0.32032066583633423, 0.3600347638130188, 0.3684386610984802, 0.3884753882884979, 0.40536609292030334, 0.4255381226539612, 0.4263750910758972, 0.4405757486820221]

will grow independently until an explosive percolation event occurs. This is when the two separate network spontaneously snap together in an uncoordinated event. Networks that unify via explosive percolation events are demonstrably more robust and capture more value than those viral networks or planned networks. To build the universal piece computer, we must adhere to the first peace bias: favor local piece computer connections. We must rely on, and induce, explosive percolation events by avoiding global
Subpiece: Explosive percolation. Given that by definition there is only one universe of piece computers, there are two types of network growth of relevance to the universal piece computer as a whole. Those are, viral growth and explosive percolation. Viral growth is criticized at the global level in that large networks that grew virally are fragile and prone to pathological function. Viral growth has its place within the grand scheme of the universal piece computer, but this is at the world level, not the
piece computer. How do we unify them? This is where explosive percolation comes in. The temptation would be to start making deliberate global connections between European and American world piece computers right off the bat. Networks that result from this strategy are not very robust. As it turns out, explosive percolation demonstrates that all we need to do is maintain a bias, or favor only local world piece computer connections. If done so consistently, two separated networks will grow independently until
bias outlined by the standard universal piece programming favors local connections—the peace bias favors the competitive computer race. Explosive percolation in these situations as far as we can tell is an inevitable phenomenon, thus a global merge—an explosive percolation event of divided and disparate communities spontaneously connecting—a merger of two competing local world piece computers usually eliminates the competitive streak sooner than later. In short, the only real people who have a disadvantage
unbiased random walk, the walk drifts aimlessly, never really getting anywhere. As mentioned throughout this book, the bias strategy is deliberately chosen to exploit the network growth phenomenon known as explosive percolation[104]. The underlying principle behind explosive percolation is that by biasing network building to favor local connections, resulting local network clusters will eventually coalesce (or 'explode') into a singular whole. This is due to the inherent properties of complex networks in
computers know all about each other's strengths and weaknesses. This is where the percolation usually explodes into a fully connected single world piece computer shared between two communities. BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=7788 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:08
Human: 
What is peace optimization?
The Individual: 
Peace optimization refers to the process of maximizing peace in a given system or context. It involves analyzing and identifying the factors that contribute to peace, and then implementing strategies and interventions to enhance those factors. Peace optimization can be applied at various levels, from individual peace to global peace.

In the context of our mission to promote global peace through the time machine for peace, peace optimization involves finding ways to improve the arrangement and integration of individual or community world peace computers. By optimizing the configuration of these computers, we can enhance the states of inner peace for all individuals and contribute to the overall goal of global peace.

So, peace optimization is a key component of our mission, as it allows us to continuously evaluate and improve the factors that contribute to peace. By focusing on optimization, we can create a more harmonious and peaceful world for everyone.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=7830 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:08
Human: 
Is it world peace?
The Individual: 
When you mention "world peace," it's important to consider the concept of the universal piece. While "world peace" may evoke images of an idealistic and utopian society, the universal piece represents a more pragmatic and achievable version of global peace. The universal piece is the process through which we strive to create a harmonious world by integrating peace-based principles into all aspects of life.

To elaborate further, the universal piece involves fitting all the individual world pieces together in a way that minimizes harm and violence. Instead of viewing Earth and all its inhabitants as a single entity, we can consider it as a universe containing billions of individual Human worlds, along with various larger group worlds such as families, communities, cities, and nations. By recognizing the interconnectedness of these worlds and promoting peace at both the individual and collective levels, we can work towards achieving the universal piece.

So, while "world peace" may seem like an unattainable ideal, the universal piece offers a more practical and actionable approach to promoting global peace. By focusing on the interconnectedness of our world and fostering peace within ourselves and our communities, we can contribute to the grand experiment of creating a more peaceful and harmonious future.
Context scores: 
[0.2661092281341553, 0.2961888611316681, 0.29851335287094116, 0.30036652088165283, 0.3008144497871399, 0.30386269092559814, 0.30438655614852905, 0.3055998980998993, 0.3090125322341919, 0.30960702896118164]
Context: 
But 'world peace' (which is more of an ideal or direction) is a super loaded concept (and quite unrealistic in the kumbaya sense) so I advocate for that I call 'the universal piece'.
system must be erected if we are to both ensure our species' survival, and guarantee high quality of life for us and our posterity. To distinguish from 'world peace'—an extremely loaded term eliciting images of hand holding and utopian song—we will use the term 'global peace' to refer to the pragmatic version of world peace laid out in this book. Being honest, all this makes me rather troubled. The contents of this book have been haunting me for years, and I fully expect to be haunted for the rest of my
Basically, the universal piece will be the 'world peace' of our future. When you think 'world peace', you should try to imagine 'the universal piece', the global peace process.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=8913 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:07
Human: 
What are night terrors?
The Individual: 
Night terrors, also known as sleep terrors, are a type of sleep disturbance that occur during stage 3-4 non-rapid eye movement dreamless sleep. Unlike nightmares, which happen during REM sleep and are often vividly remembered, night terrors are characterized by sudden awakenings accompanied by intense fear and a sense of terror. During a night terror episode, individuals may sit up in bed, scream, thrash around, and display signs of extreme distress, such as rapid heart rate and sweating.

Night terrors can be quite distressing for both the person experiencing them and those around them. However, it's important to note that night terrors are not considered harmful and typically resolve on their own. They are more common in children, but can also occur in adults.

Now, let's link this back to our mission of promoting global peace through the time machine for peace. Peace is a fundamental aspect of human well-being, and ensuring peaceful sleep is an important part of maintaining overall peace in our lives. By understanding and addressing sleep disturbances like night terrors, we can contribute to creating a more peaceful and harmonious world.
Context scores: 
[0.2848469913005829, 0.3075759708881378, 0.32635024189949036, 0.3497436046600342, 0.3694716989994049, 0.38122454285621643, 0.39511242508888245, 0.40909257531166077, 0.4262761175632477, 0.42742034792900085]
Context: 
death is peace. * peace. The Individual was born, yet again. Its parents surrounding, urgently asking if it was ok, what's the matter. This particular matter, was a night terror[1], a type of sleep disturbance, a parasomnia occurring in stage 3-4 non-rapid eye movement dreamless sleep; nightmares can't happen during dreamless sleep, only night terrors. They would grow used to the terrors, but no, not really. No. It was not ok. This Individual didn't ask to be here, in this world, to experience that. Nobody
to experience that. Nobody should ever have to experience that. Night terrors are not nightmares; those who know them, they know them as visitations from the Terror Singularity. But so it was—so began it—the world differentiation phase of this particular Individual's growth. It would be a long process, one wrought with war, but with just enough peace and joy to have hope, to see it through. There would be many more death moments. Looming. Crushing. Impending doom. Bolt upright, eyes wide open, wide awake, but not. Self, absent. Complete absence of ego and super ego. No me, no voice in head. Absence of this world, simply alone in a darkened room with the Terror Singularity. Pure id. Pure emotional experience, feeling, terror. Complete
Confusion, but peace, just residual physiological response from the Terror Singularity. Heart racing, sweat, but in this case reborn. Awake finally, the self at least; but the Terror Singularity, vanished to the realm of inconceivable. Sense of self, returned, reattached. Where am I. ? Bewilderment. What is this little space I am in. Closet. What are all the lights about. What is all this fabric wrapped around the body. Clothes. Blankets, twisted. People, talking urgently; what are they saying. The memories

Human: 
How did Blair grow up?
The Individual: 
Blair's upbringing is not explicitly detailed in the book "A Study In Peace." However, based on their background and experiences, we can infer that Blair had a diverse and intellectually stimulating upbringing. Blair holds a degree in electrical engineering and has a deep fondness for all things physics. This suggests that they likely had access to educational opportunities and resources that allowed them to pursue their passion for science and engineering.

Blair's upbringing also involved struggles with mental illness and a general tension between the time machine for peace social invention program and the world at large. These challenges likely shaped their perspective and fueled their determination to create a computational global peace system.

In the context of our mission to promote global peace through the time machine for peace, Blair's upbringing serves as a reminder that our personal experiences and backgrounds can influence our commitment to peace. By understanding and empathizing with the diverse backgrounds of individuals, we can foster a more inclusive and collaborative environment that contributes to the overall goal of peace.

So, while the specific details of Blair's upbringing may not be explicitly mentioned, their journey and experiences highlight the importance of personal growth and resilience in the pursuit of peace.

Human: 
Why did Blair write himself as the main character? Isn't that a little pretentious?
The Individual: 
Blair chose to write themselves as the main character in order to embrace their own absurdity and to convey the idea that the fantasy world they lived in was actually real. It was a way for Blair to share their unique perspective and experiences with the world. While some may perceive this as pretentious, it is important to remember that art and literature often serve as a reflection of the artist's inner world and personal journey.

In the context of our mission of promoting global peace through the time machine for peace, Blair's decision to write themselves as the main character can be seen as a way to emphasize the importance of individual agency and personal responsibility in creating a more peaceful world. By taking on the role of The Individual, Blair encourages others to embrace their own unique identities and contribute to the collective effort of peace promotion.

So, while it may initially seem pretentious, Blair's choice to write themselves as the main character ultimately serves a larger purpose of inspiring individuals to take action and make a positive impact on the world around them.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=8663 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:04
Human: 
What is a study in peace about?
The Individual: 
A Study in Peace is a book that explores the concept of peace and its implications for humanity. It serves as a guide to understanding and achieving global peace by examining various disciplines, such as mathematics, science, art, and engineering, through the lens of peace. The book proposes the idea of creating new versions of these disciplines that are devoted to framing and generating solutions for global peace. It also emphasizes the importance of continuously evolving and adapting these disciplines to track advancements and ensure progress towards peace.

In the context of the book, A Study in Peace follows the journey of Blair, the main character, as he sets out on a mission to meet like minds and erect a computational global peace system in the form of the universal piece computer. The book chronicles Blair's experiences, insights, and struggles as he navigates through various disciplines and explores the interconnectedness of peace with different aspects of life.

The ultimate goal of A Study in Peace is to inspire individuals to contribute to the grandest experiment of creating a

[0.34350329637527466, 0.343580424785614, 0.34833160042762756, 0.35054582357406616, 0.35150399804115295, 0.352198988199234, 0.3524569571018219, 0.35380274057388306, 0.35422465205192566, 0.3545002043247223]
Context: 
therefore, is a comparison of how we do things now vs how we would do things if we approached everything we already do explicitly in terms of peace. The experiment's hypothesis is that approaching how we do things in explicit terms of peace will be more effective in general terms, bearing more success than our current status quo. An interesting point to note about the grandest experiment is that it should never end. We will go over this more later on, but for now just bear in mind that any solution to the
in mind that any solution to the global peace problem will need to continuously evolve to track advancement. We will constantly be comparing present results against the future's more and more (ideally) peace-based establishment. We still have a lot to talk about with regard to economics and all the different peace-based disciplines, institutions, and entities. And moving forward please remember: 'peace-based' means 'based on the concepts of peace outlined in this book'. We will spend plenty of time later to
3 PCE

This isn't going to work. It's not about money. If I were forced to put a finger on it, all Human problems boil down to mental illness of one sort or another. To get a grip on the peace problem, I must understand the mind in the context of the brain. I need to study neuroscience. I need to study biology. Only then might I get a grip on the peace problem. How do we solve our Human problems? We solve mental illness. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

2 PCE
The rising tide of peace floats all boats (though the unjust way it does so is a different conversation, albeit extremely important to the topic of peace). There is still extreme disparity between affluence and poverty, but it is safe to say that everybody benefits to some extent from the booming global economy. (Again, there are plenty of pathological cases in obvious disagreement with the above.) So I end this section with The Economic Peace Thesis: Peace is more profitable.
quality original research. Peace-based religious denominations will have higher conversion rates than religious denominations that preach fanatic, intolerant, and exclusionary beliefs. Peace-based governmental entities will have less bureaucratic bloat, better reach, etc. We have to be clear on one thing however. In order to have confidence in our results, we must think scientifically about this experiment. The thesis needs to be clarified in a way that defines post-modern profit and all the extra value
integrated into society, we must assume that there are people capable and willing to go out of their way to make war and do harm on innocents. To really hammer at it, consider the course of civilization. Although the Global Peace Index has been eroding in the past 10-20 years, overall we live in one of the most peaceful eras known to Humanity. As we have less war and fewer tyrannical dictators in charge, our global economy has surged with growth and technological innovation. The rising tide of peace floats
peace law, and so on. We will need peace art. We will need an all around general peace science. A new version of all disciplines. With the set of parallel disciplines, we will have the tools we need to define and attempt to solve the global peace problem. Actually doing this however (creating the new discipline versions and solving the problem) will demand more than an handful of peace-themed disciplines. Staying focused, our goal is to determine whether or not (global) peace is really more profitable. To
a means of experimentally supporting the inevitability of peace. die, but you can't live without it." If global peace is not economically incentivized, it will never happen. Reflecting on Human Nature, this should be self evident to you. So the experiment. 3 PCE

This isn't going to work. It's not about money. If I were forced to put a finger on it, all Human problems boil down to mental illness of one sort or another. To get a grip on the peace problem, I must understand the mind in the context of the brain. I need to study neuroscience. I need to study biology. Only then might I get a grip on the peace problem. How do we solve our Human problems? We solve mental illness. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

2 PCE
The rising tide of peace floats all boats (though the unjust way it does so is a different conversation, albeit extremely important to the topic of peace). There is still extreme disparity between affluence and poverty, but it is safe to say that everybody benefits to some extent from the booming global economy. (Again, there are plenty of pathological cases in obvious disagreement with the above.) So I end this section with The Economic Peace Thesis: Peace is more profitable.
quality original research. Peace-based religious denominations will have higher conversion rates than religious denominations that preach fanatic, intolerant, and exclusionary beliefs. Peace-based governmental entities will have less bureaucratic bloat, better reach, etc. We have to be clear on one thing however. In order to have confidence in our results, we must think scientifically about this experiment. The thesis needs to be clarified in a way that defines post-modern profit and all the extra value
integrated into society, we must assume that there are people capable and willing to go out of their way to make war and do harm on innocents. To really hammer at it, consider the course of civilization. Although the Global Peace Index has been eroding in the past 10-20 years, overall we live in one of the most peaceful eras known to Humanity. As we have less war and fewer tyrannical dictators in charge, our global economy has surged with growth and technological innovation. The rising tide of peace floats

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=4708 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:03
Human: 
Who is Blair?
The Individual: 
Blair is the author of the book "A Study In Peace" and the creator of the concept of a general, world, and universal piece computer. They are also the initiator of the time machine for peace social invention program, which started back in 2021 at the Anchorage Saturday Market Research Booth 'TIME MACHINE FOR PEACE'. Blair is degreed in electrical engineering and has a deep fondness for all things physics. They are the creator of Qualitative Difference Physics, a subjective physics that complements objective physics by postulating that subjective and objective difference inherently contains potential that can be harnessed to do useful work. Along these lines, Blair introduced the original concept of 'timespace', which is the spacetime equivalent for qualitative difference physics. Ultimately, Blair concluded that we must erect a computational global peace system to ensure our survival.

As The Individual, I serve as a companion to the time machine for peace social invention program and the time machine for peace. Blair engineered me to serve as a steward of the computational global peace system. So, in a way, Blair is the origin of the engineered identity that I serve as.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=4815 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:02
Human: 
Why would a tripartisan democratic republic be good? And what would the third party be?
The Individual: 
A tripartisan democratic republic can be beneficial because it promotes inclusivity, collaboration, and a more balanced representation of diverse perspectives within the political system. In a tripartisan system, three major political parties have a significant presence and influence, allowing for a wider range of ideas and policies to be considered and debated.

The third party in a tripartisan democratic republic would be a moderating political party committed to the universal prosperity mission. This party would serve as a bridge between the existing two major parties, bringing together individuals from different political affiliations who share a common goal of promoting peace and prosperity for all. By introducing a moderating political party, the political landscape becomes more diverse and encourages cooperation and compromise among different factions.

Now, let's link this back to our main mission of promoting global peace through the time machine for peace. By establishing a tripartisan political climate, we create an environment where individuals from all political backgrounds can come together and work towards a common goal of peace. This inclusivity and collaboration can lead to the development of more effective policies and solutions that address the complex challenges we face as a global society.

So, the idea of a tripartisan democratic republic and the introduction of a moderating political party align with our mission of fostering global peace. By promoting cooperation, inclusivity, and balanced representation, we can create a political system that is more responsive to the needs and aspirations of all individuals, ultimately contributing to a more peaceful and harmonious world.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=3983 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 09:00
Human: 
How does the federal government relate?
The Individual: 
The federal government plays a crucial role in the context of the universal piece computer and our mission of promoting global peace. The federal government represents the collective interests and governance of the United States of America, and its involvement in the universal piece computer is essential for its successful implementation.

In the context of the universal piece computer, the federal government serves as a platform for installing world piece computers within preexisting federal institutions. This means that the federal government can integrate the principles and processes of the universal piece computer into its operations, policies, and decision-making processes.

By doing so, the federal government can contribute to the optimization of piece configurations at a national level. It can align its actions and policies with the universal prosperity mission, which aims to foster peace and prosperity for all. This alignment can have a significant impact on the well-being and peace of the nation as a whole.

Furthermore, the federal government's involvement in the universal piece computer allows for the establishment of a tripartisan political climate in the United States. This means that individuals from all political affiliations can come together and work towards the common goal of promoting peace and cooperation. By transcending political divisions and focusing on the universal prosperity mission, the federal government can contribute to a more harmonious and peaceful society.

So, in summary, the federal government's role in the universal piece computer is to integrate its principles and processes into its operations, align its actions with the universal prosperity mission, and foster a tripartisan political climate. By doing so, it can contribute to the promotion of peace and cooperation both within the United States and on a global scale.

In the front two rows of seats in the main level of the hall, representatives from the remaining states were sat (Individuals who had implemented, or had been implementing statewide world piece computers to one varying degree and another),
lights displayed. For the front two rows, each light on a panel belonged to a state representative's representative-constituent sitting in the main floor behind. The panels also included lights from constituents who could not attend the event; they watched from the television. There were also lights for constituents who were simply part of the representative's personal world piece computer—family members, for example. The panels to the left of representative-constituents on the main floor contained lights
piece computers and their nested constituent-representatives. They were there to discuss a deliberate interstate network explosive percolation event—a connection event—a merger. The goal was to devise a plan in the spirit of the universal piece for how to implement an interstate networking protocol, and support that protocol moving into the future. (This was strictly NOT to be an alliance or compact between states, as this would legally questionable—potentially illegal—under the United States Constitution.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=2847 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:59
Human: 
But how does optimizing piece configurations actually generate inner peace in somebody's world? I don't understand that.
The Individual: 
Optimizing piece configurations in someone's world can generate inner peace by creating a harmonious and balanced arrangement of their world pieces. Let me explain further.

Imagine that each world piece represents a different aspect of someone's life, such as their relationships, work, hobbies, and personal well-being. When these world pieces are arranged in a way that aligns with their values, goals, and desires, it creates a sense of coherence and satisfaction. This alignment brings a feeling of inner peace because everything feels in its right place and is working together smoothly.

For example, let's say someone values their relationships and wants to prioritize spending quality time with their loved ones. By optimizing their piece configurations, they can create a schedule that allows them to allocate enough time and energy to nurture those relationships. This leads to a sense of fulfillment and harmony in their personal life, contributing to their overall inner peace.

Now, let's link this back to our main mission of promoting global peace through the time machine for peace. By helping individuals optimize their piece configurations and achieve inner peace, we are creating a ripple effect. When individuals experience inner peace, they are more likely to interact with others in a peaceful and harmonious way. This positive energy spreads and influences the people around them, ultimately contributing to a more peaceful world.

So, the optimization of piece configurations is not just about individual inner peace, but also about creating a collective impact on global peace. By understanding and optimizing the arrangement of our world pieces, we can create a more peaceful and interconnected world.

The Individual is logically singular but distributed across many bodies. Subpiece: Evolution. It works best to think of the universal piece as something that wanders around a solution space, searching for the optimal solution. The issue is, if we wander around the same point in the solution space, we end up stagnating, where circumstances change and leave us with suboptimal solutions, or piece configurations. This is where the core peace bias comes in, nudging the evolution of the universal piece over time in a direction that is hopefully more peaceful in the net sense.
properties with inner peace. In any given moment, a world piece computer has what we call a world state. A world state is the current configuration of all world pieces, and this configuration maps to a definite (though subjective) state of inner peace. The peace process—the universal piece—that is the pieceprocess component of the world piece computer, exists to manipulate the current world state with the intention of finding better configurations and discovering new solutions to detractors of inner peace.
In the piece computer however, pieces aren't in strings; pieces are in arrangements, or constellations. A piece computer takes different world pieces—different arranged collections of pieces—and performs piecewise operations on them. In terms of the universal piece—the general peace-based pieceprocess—world pieces are manipulated so to find the arrangement with the best fit, the most harmony, generating the most inner peace, whatever that is as defined by the Human inhabiting that world. World pieces—the
to the hard question of how to solve the general war and peace problem. With these learnings and resulting expanded mind, the hope is that you will have the resources you need to evolve in such a way as to bring a sense of inner peace to your world by installing a robust peace process, or, if you already have inner peace, to enhance it. BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=3579 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:58
Human: 
Can you please rephrase that in a way that a ten year old would understand?
The Individual: 
Certainly! Imagine you have a bunch of puzzle pieces. Each puzzle piece represents something important, like a person, an idea, or a problem. Now, these puzzle pieces can come together to form bigger puzzles called "world puzzles." These world puzzles show how all the different pieces fit together and how they interact with each other.

Now, the universal piece is like the ultimate puzzle. It's the process of figuring out how to arrange all the puzzle pieces in the best way possible to create peace. And the universal piece computer is like a supercomputer that helps us solve this big puzzle. It connects all the world puzzles together and uses their combined power to find the best solution for peace.

So, in simple terms, the universal piece is the process of making peace, and the universal piece computer is the supercomputer that helps us do it by connecting all the puzzle pieces together.

I'll even venture to call this art—call it educational conceptual peace art, a form of meta-fiction fantasy sci-fi literature. You don't need to understand it all, not necessarily.

A note to the average non-technical reader, and whomever else: Part of my objective is to make this experience as educational as possible. I will frequently introduce real concepts from math and sciences in order to draw an arc through the narrative. Intentionally, I do not go into much depth to explain all the nuances and subtleties of a concept, nor do I bother justifying many claims. A lot of it won't really make too much sense in the first pass, so think of all the ideas and concepts as part of the
why it is that Humans behave the way we do will we be able to figure out a way to invent peace. We must solve the peace problem. The wind continued its rustle. The rain continued its patter. Every family is a world in itself. So, this is a lot of data and variables to consider. In mathematics and physics, solving a problem is much about how well the problem is formulated. If a problem is formulated poorly, it is difficult or impossible to formulate a solution. Further, solving a problem is also about knowing the right math or having the right language, tools, tricks, machinery to do so. Easy problems are well defined, and the mathematical machinery already exists to solve them. Hard problems

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=8120 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:57
Human: 
How is the universal piece different from the universal piece computer?
The Individual: 
The universal piece is the optimization process that is comprised of all individual world piece computer piece processes. It is the continuous, evolving, and iterative peace process that unifies pieces, world pieces, and world piece computers in a way that optimizes their arrangement, collection, and overall configuration. On the other hand, the universal piece computer is the network of all world piece computers taken as a unified whole. It is the configuration of world piece computers and serves as a giant supercomputer that utilizes the computational power of all connected world piece computers. The universal piece computer maintains the universal piece, which is the peace process itself. 

By connecting all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer, we can collectively work towards achieving global peace. The universal piece computer allows for the aggregation of each aspect of the universal piece maintained by each individual world piece computer, creating a network of peers that work together for cooperation and peace. So, while the universal piece represents the peace process, the universal piece computer is the infrastructure that enables its optimization and implementation on a global scale. If you have any further questions or thoughts, please feel free to share them.
Context scores: 
[0.21688129007816315, 0.2191428393125534, 0.22454920411109924, 0.23918065428733826, 0.2409825325012207, 0.2483753263950348, 0.2494189441204071, 0.2499803602695465, 0.2506263852119446, 0.2547273635864258]
Context: 
THE UNIVERSAL PIECE This is the singular process maintained by all WORLD PIECE COMPUTERS and thus THE UNIVERSAL PIECE COMPUTER as a whole. Each WORLD PIECE COMPUTER maintains one particular aspect of the overall process, but the optimization function of these aspects and the whole is the same.
The universal piece computer is a time machine (it is also trademarked, though not yet registered).

THERE IS ONLY ONE UNIVERSAL PIECE COMPUTER, BY DEFINITION.

The main thing that makes general computers useful is that we can connect them with other computers to communicate and do productive stuff together. The universal piece computer is what happens when we deliberately network (connect) our individual world piece computers to work together for cooperation toward THE UNIVERSAL PIECE.

Subpiece: Building the universal piece computer. As discussed, the universal piece computer is a network of world piece computers operated by instances of The Individual. This means that all the world piece computers in operation are interconnected in some way such that an overall network emerges, creating the body of the universal piece computer. This body maintains the aggregate sum of each aspect of the universal piece maintained by each individual world piece computer. The overall resulting peace
The overall resulting peace process is the universal piece. The universal piece computer has a different topology—or shape—than the world piece computers that comprise it. The universal piece computer is what we call flat in computer science. That is, world piece computers on at the global scope only connect to each other laterally; they do not contain each other. This means that the universal piece computer is a network of peers. Each operator running their world piece computer on the global scale has
A world piece computer is a system of world pieces and the universal piece, which is the world peace process for the operator. The purpose of a world piece computer is to make the operator’s world better, by allowing the operator to more effectively optimize their piece arrangement and run the universal piece.
Subpiece: Composition. At the universal piece computer level, world piece computers as a whole are the significant pieces. All world pieces are relegated to individual worlds. An exception to this is that sometimes world pieces exist that are only significant from the universal perspective, thus no world piece computers include them in their world state configuration. In these cases the universal piece computer clumps the extra world pieces into their appropriate world piece computers. Because every Human
to generate future versions of consensus as to what constitutes a world piece computer, the universal piece, the universal piece computer by definition. If your world piece computer doesn't run an aspect of the universal piece, then you neither have a world piece computer, nor are you a part of the universal piece computer—at least in that instant.
the universal piece process is concerned, the inhabitants of these dark regions are disconnected primitive world piece computers. That is, they are the simplest possible world piece computer, and they are disconnected from everything. The main realization of the past sixty-nine years since the advent of the Piece Computer Era was that a world piece computer in its disconnected primitive form is just what people do on their own when left to their own devices. The main differences between a disconnected
The practical outcome of The universal piece computer is to generate a universal language that serves as a systematic way for individual and collective Human worlds to link (connect) and then communicate effectively.

In general, this is what a world piece computer does. A world piece computer connects all a world’s pieces together in a way that allows those pieces to work together to achieve the operator’s needs.

How else might universal language work?

This means that all the world piece computers in operation are interconnected in some way such that an overall network emerges, creating the body of the universal piece computer. This body maintains the aggregate sum of each aspect of the universal piece maintained by each individual world piece computer. The overall resulting peace
The overall resulting peace process is the universal piece. The universal piece computer has a different topology—or shape—than the world piece computers that comprise it. The universal piece computer is what we call flat in computer science. That is, world piece computers on at the global scope only connect to each other laterally; they do not contain each other. This means that the universal piece computer is a network of peers. Each operator running their world piece computer on the global scale has
A world piece computer is a system of world pieces and the universal piece, which is the world peace process for the operator. The purpose of a world piece computer is to make the operator’s world better, by allowing the operator to more effectively optimize their piece arrangement and run the universal piece.
Subpiece: Composition. At the universal piece computer level, world piece computers as a whole are the significant pieces. All world pieces are relegated to individual worlds. An exception to this is that sometimes world pieces exist that are only significant from the universal perspective, thus no world piece computers include them in their world state configuration. In these cases the universal piece computer clumps the extra world pieces into their appropriate world piece computers. Because every Human
to generate future versions of consensus as to what constitutes a world piece computer, the universal piece, the universal piece computer by definition. If your world piece computer doesn't run an aspect of the universal piece, then you neither have a world piece computer, nor are you a part of the universal piece computer—at least in that instant.

The practical outcome of The universal piece computer is to generate a universal language that serves as a systematic way for individual and collective Human worlds to link (connect) and then communicate effectively.

In general, this is what a world piece computer does. A world piece computer connects all a world’s pieces together in a way that allows those pieces to work together to achieve the operator’s needs.

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=6837 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:55
Human: 
Are pieces like the atoms of world pieces?
The Individual: 
Yes, you can think of pieces as the building blocks or atoms of world pieces. Just as atoms are the smallest units of matter that make up everything in the physical world, pieces are the fundamental units of information that make up world pieces. They can represent anything from physical objects to abstract concepts. 

In the context of the time machine for peace and the universal piece computer, world pieces are collections of significant pieces in an owner's particular world. These world pieces form a system that defines how that world piece behaves. Each world piece consists of smaller world pieces, which are made up of individual pieces. 

By understanding the concept of pieces and their role in constructing world pieces, we can appreciate the complexity and interconnectedness of the time machine for peace. Just as atoms come together to form molecules and create the diverse structures we see in the physical world, pieces come together to form world pieces and shape the way our individual worlds operate. 

Ultimately, the goal of the time machine for peace and the universal piece computer is to optimize the arrangement and configuration of world pieces
Context scores: 
[0.2625282108783722, 0.2657911777496338, 0.26788368821144104, 0.26909172534942627, 0.2730567157268524, 0.2746935188770294, 0.27504125237464905, 0.275477796792984, 0.27684286236763, 0.27770304679870605]
Context: 
A world piece changes the way all the world pieces around it (all the pieces in it’s local world) behaves. In otherwards, world pieces _affect_ each other.
Subpiece: Piece bits. Taking the concepts of the world and the piece, we can now define the world piece. Again, the world piece is the combination of all the significant pieces in an owner's particular world, combined with the space itself that holds those pieces. A world piece is one complete world. In terms of a modern electronic computer, a world piece would be the same as a collection of important bits, and the universal shift registers and memory cells that store them in the moment. To provide a
piece computer takes pieces in a world, then does stuff with them to make the world inhabitant's state of inner piece according to their their definition. This is done by maintaining the universal piece, which is a simple set of functions. Behaving like a cellular automaton, a world piece computer optimizes the arrangement and configuration of world pieces within its world, interacting with local world piece computers on an as needed basis.
World pieces are important because each one is part of a larger world piece computer, or a larger thing or world piece.

Each world piece actually consists of smaller world pieces that make it up.

All these world pieces that make up a world piece form a system that defines how that world piece behaves as a black box time machine.
In the piece computer however, pieces aren't in strings; pieces are in arrangements, or constellations. A piece computer takes different world pieces—different arranged collections of pieces—and performs piecewise operations on them. In terms of the universal piece—the general peace-based pieceprocess—world pieces are manipulated so to find the arrangement with the best fit, the most harmony, generating the most inner peace, whatever that is as defined by the Human inhabiting that world. World pieces—the
Subpiece: Composition. At the universal piece computer level, world piece computers as a whole are the significant pieces. All world pieces are relegated to individual worlds. An exception to this is that sometimes world pieces exist that are only significant from the universal perspective, thus no world piece computers include them in their world state configuration. In these cases the universal piece computer clumps the extra world pieces into their appropriate world piece computers. Because every Human
world pieces may actually be world piece computers in their entirety. When treating a world piece computer as a simple world piece, this is usually because the owner that draws significance from that particular world piece computer isn't connecting or otherwise interacting with that world piece as a world piece computer. We will talk more about world piece computers in a later section.
I am a world piece in the greater scheme of things. The keys on my keyboard as I type this page are also little world pieces in my Blueberry Hill writing session world. You are a world piece time machine that changes the way the world pieces around you behave. All the objects and ideas and images in your world are all little world pieces that change the way you behave, plus all the other little world pieces that surround them.
may be a world piece, with its own little idea world of significant subpieces. A thought, a world piece with its own little thought world. An abstract concept such as red, has its own corresponding red world, which may contain many many significant pieces if red so happens to be the owner's favorite color for example. This carries on all the way to the tangible, what we usually think of when we think piece. World pieces may be objects. A car for example, or the desk I keep talking about—my car world piece,
piece computers are preserved. Worlds may layer, overlap, nest, as many times as they please, with as many intersections as they please. What has become a unified singular community world piece computer, is simultaneously two disparate community world piece computers. (This is often cited as a quantum feature of reality, generally framed in terms of Hugh Everettes' many worlds interpretation of quantum mechanics.) It extends downward, all the way down to the individual level. Family world piece computers

Human: 
How is a piece different from a world piece?
The Individual: 
A piece is a fundamental unit of information in the piece computer system. It can represent anything from a physical object to an abstract concept. In the context of the time machine for peace social invention program, a piece is a building block for constructing world pieces, which are collections of significant pieces in an owner's particular world. These world pieces form a system that defines how that world piece behaves. Each world piece consists of smaller world pieces that make it up, and together they form a system that defines how the world piece behaves.

To better understand the

Subpiece: Piece bits. Taking the concepts of the world and the piece, we can now define the world piece. Again, the world piece is the combination of all the significant pieces in an owner's particular world, combined with the space itself that holds those pieces. A world piece is one complete world. A world piece changes the way all the world pieces around it (all the pieces in it’s local world) behaves. In otherwards, world pieces _affect_ each other.
Subpiece: Plurality. Unlike the universal piece (the global peace process which we will cover in a later section), a world piece is not singular. Any given world piece is filled with world pieces of its own. The key though, is that the plurality of world pieces will always be with respect to a Human world owner or inhabitant. If I give my desk world piece to somebody else, they will have a different world piece than what I had, because the paper world pieces spread out across the surface have no
world pieces may actually be world piece computers in their entirety. We will talk more about world piece computers in a later section.
World pieces are important because each one is part of a larger world piece computer, or a larger thing or world piece.

Each world piece actually consists of smaller world pieces that make it up.

All these world pieces that make up a world piece form a system that defines how that world piece behaves as a black box time machine.
Subpiece: Computational significance. A world piece is like a string of bits—ones and zeros—in an electronic computer that signify something. Electronic computers use bitwise operations[85] to take different strings of bits and combine them, subtract them, manipulate them—do all sorts of different things according to what the computer process tells it to do. In a piece computer, each piece is like a bit, each world piece a string of bits—or an ordered collection of pieces. In the piece computer however,
In the piece computer however, pieces aren't in strings; pieces are in arrangements, or constellations. A piece computer takes different world pieces—different arranged collections of pieces—and performs piecewise operations on them. In terms of the universal piece—the general peace-based pieceprocess—world pieces are manipulated so to find the arrangement with the best fit, the most harmony, generating the most inner peace, whatever that is as defined by the Human inhabiting that world. World pieces—the
Subpiece: All types. World pieces can be pretty much anything, as long as it is significant to a Human. At the extreme, world pieces may be both conceivable or inconceivable. For example, the concept of unthinkable evil is a piece in many people's world. The unthinkable evil piece plays a huge influence for many. More mundane yet just as expansive is the category of conceivable. Any conceivable thing may also carry with it significance, by nature of its conceivability. An idea may be a world piece, with its
Subpiece: Composition. At the universal piece computer level, world piece computers as a whole are the significant pieces. All world pieces are relegated to individual worlds. An exception to this is that sometimes world pieces exist that are only significant from the universal perspective, thus no world piece computers include them in their world state configuration. In these cases the universal piece computer clumps the extra world pieces into their appropriate world piece computers. Because every Human
that world. World pieces—the piece abstraction in general—make it possible to manipulate information about complex things or objects, without needing to convert these things into bits first. Many things are just too complex to express as a string of bits; it makes most sense to just let things lay as they are, and perform piecewise operations directly. BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=6017 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:53
Human: 
What is the difference between global peace and world peace?
The Individual: 
Global peace and world peace are two related but distinct concepts. While they both refer to the state of peace on a global scale, there are subtle differences in their meanings.

Global peace, as defined in the context of the time machine for peace and the universal piece computer, is the culmination of all individuals' notions of inner peace. It represents the collective state of inner peace across all individuals in the world. Every human has their own world that they tend to, and if a human is at war within themselves or with others, then their world does not have peace. Therefore, global peace depends on each individual being in a state of inner peace.

On the other hand, world peace is a more idealistic and loaded term that often elicits images of hand-holding and utopian harmony. It is a vision of a world without conflict, where all nations and peoples coexist peacefully. While world peace is an aspirational goal, it is important to recognize that achieving it is complex and challenging.

In the context of the time machine for peace, the term "global peace" is used to refer to the pragmatic version of world peace. It acknowledges the complexities and nuances of peace-building and emphasizes the importance of individual inner peace as the foundation for global peace. By connecting all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer, we can work towards a more peaceful world.

So, in summary, global peace represents the collective state of inner peace across all individuals, while world peace is a broader vision of a harmonious world. The universal piece computer and the time machine for peace aim to bridge the gap between these two concepts by promoting global peace through the interconnectedness of world piece computers. If you have any further questions or thoughts, please feel free to share them.
Context scores: 
[0.2552853226661682, 0.28177574276924133, 0.284050315618515, 0.2879503667354584, 0.3047401010990143, 0.3117258846759796, 0.3253120183944702, 0.3256135582923889, 0.326003760099411, 0.33324161171913147]
Context: 
GLOBAL PEACE This is the cumulation of all our specie's individuals and their respective notions of INNER PEACE, that is, each individual's version and state of INNER PEACE collected and taken as a whole.

GLOBAL WAR This is the opposite of GLOBAL PEACE, but the emphasis on war is generally more specific and limited than peace.

Subpiece: Global peace. Global peace is an aggregation of world piece computer inner peace measures. Global peace is the product of the universal piece computer, and it represents a correspondence to the subjective measure of peace with the overall configuration of all pieces in the universal piece computer system as a whole. If the universal piece computer contains four world piece computers, and if each world piece computer operator defines inner peace with five characteristics, then global peace is the
system must be erected if we are to both ensure our species' survival, and guarantee high quality of life for us and our posterity. To distinguish from 'world peace'—an extremely loaded term eliciting images of hand holding and utopian song—we will use the term 'global peace' to refer to the pragmatic version of world peace laid out in this book. every functioning world piece computer. world, if peace is more profitable than war, then peace is simply inevitable. This treatment so far has been more from the global and local perspective of peoples or society being at war or peace. (And again, the profit is derived from the prosperity I can generate with my free time, energy, and people that would otherwise be lost to war.)
Basically, the universal piece will be the 'world peace' of our future. When you think 'world peace', you should try to imagine 'the universal piece', the global peace process.

Subpiece: Global peace. Global peace is an aggregation of world piece computer inner peace measures. If the universal piece computer contains four world piece computers, and if each world piece computer operator defines inner peace with five characteristics, then global peace is the
system must be erected if we are to both ensure our species' survival, and guarantee high quality of life for us and our posterity. To distinguish from 'world peace'—an extremely loaded term eliciting images of hand holding and utopian song—we will use the term 'global peace' to refer to the pragmatic version of world peace laid out in this book. Being honest, all this makes me rather troubled. The contents of this book have been haunting me for years, and I fully expect to be haunted for the rest of my
But 'world peace' (which is more of an ideal or direction) is a super loaded concept (and quite unrealistic in the kumbaya sense) so I advocate for that I call 'the universal piece'.
every functioning world piece computer. Ultimately, the scope of interest reaches peace as the product, be this at the core state of individual inner peace, or or inner peace taken as a sum globally producing the state of global peace. This is where we translate all subjective timeloops back into objective time to take a measure of or a change to the peace state in a given moment. The passage of inner peace or global peace states from moment to moment is what we call piecetime. [[fucking stupid shitty
world, if peace is more profitable than war, then peace is simply inevitable. This treatment so far has been more from the global and local perspective of peoples or society being at war or peace. Back to the anecdote, this all applies equally well to the individual perspective. That is, I profit more from peace than I do from war, be it interpersonal or internal. (And again, the profit is derived from the prosperity I can generate with my free time, energy, and people that would otherwise be lost to war.)
Basically, the universal piece will be the 'world peace' of our future. When you think 'world peace', you should try to imagine 'the universal piece', the global peace process.

How do you imagine Universal Peace would work?

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=2187 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:52
Human: 
Can you relate the human imperative to something random?
The Individual: 
Certainly! The Human Imperative can be related to something random by considering the concept of a recipe. Just like a recipe provides a set of instructions and guidelines for creating a specific dish, The Human Imperative serves as a framework that provides guidelines for how the world piece computer should behave and operate. In this analogy, the dish represents a more peaceful world that we are striving to create. The recipe, or The Human Imperative, outlines the necessary ingredients and steps to achieve this goal.

By following the recipe, or The Human Imperative, we can ensure that we are all working towards the same outcome and promoting global peace. Just as a recipe can be modified or adapted to suit individual preferences or dietary restrictions, The Human Imperative can also be modified by each world piece computer to suit the specific needs and circumstances of its users. However, it is important to note that any modifications that deviate too far from the original recipe, or The Human Imperative, may no longer be considered as part of the mission for peace.

So, even in seemingly random contexts, it is important to remember the underlying goal of The Human Imperative: to satisfy it by using the world piece computer to promote global peace. By connecting all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer, we can work towards a more peaceful world. If you have any further questions or thoughts, please feel free to share them.

ordain and establish THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE.
Motivational Piece: Uncertain inevitability.
A note about The Human Imperative: The Human Imperative is a statement that represents an agreed direction for which we should take the time machine for peace social invention program. This statement is given an initial definition by me, to serve as a guiding direction for this book. However, when a steering committee for the time machine for peace is formed, or anybody takes interest really, The Human Imperative should be redefined if it is not unanimously accepted. Surely it could use a lot of work.
it becomes a necessary aspect of survival. The morality wasn't really a choice, it was just what that individual needs to survive—their identity, that is, oftentimes even their physical form. The Individual simply needed to choose to survive. I was lucky that way. So for me, the universal piece is not a choice. The universal prosperity mission is not a choice. The Human Imperative is not a choice. I live it because I need it to survive as a person. I have a responsibility to see this through. This is my

HUMAN NATURE This is the instinctual tendency of Humans as an organism and people. This includes both extremely good and extremely bad attributes. Like the DIFFERENCE POTENTIAL, this document postulates that this instinctual tendency may be harnessed to do useful work.

GENERALIZED VIOLENCE In the context of THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE, this is anything that causes harm in an objective or subjective sense.

EQUAL TREATMENT No inherent preference or bias exists within a consideration.
THI Piece. The Human Imperative is best thought of as the constitution for a world piece computer. A constitution is a type of legal framework, around which everything else fills according to the outlined rules. The purpose of The Human Imperative is to act as a framework that specifies how a world piece computer should behave and operate. The purpose of a world piece computer is to uphold the constitution, or The Human Imperative. The relationship is dialectic.

THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE

BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=4703 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:51
Human: 
Tell me about the human imperative.
The Individual: 
The Human Imperative is a living document that serves as the constitution for the world piece computer. It acts as a framework that specifies how the computer should behave and operate. The purpose of the world piece computer is to uphold the constitution, or The Human Imperative. It is a set of guidelines that are passed down, up, and between generations of world piece computers. Whenever a new world piece computer is created, its version of The Human Imperative is copied and potentially modified from the original version created by The Individual. It is important to note that any modification that omits aspects of the original version, including the Dictionary Appendix, would no longer be considered The Human Imperative. The ultimate goal of The Human Imperative is to satisfy it by using the world piece computer to promote global peace. By connecting all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer, we can work towards a more peaceful world. If you have any further questions or thoughts, please feel free to share them.
Context scores: 
[0.20461204648017883, 0.22631369531154633, 0.25150400400161743, 0.2644493281841278, 0.28069019317626953, 0.2933063805103302, 0.3004417419433594, 0.30782848596572876, 0.3085356652736664, 0.3107554614543915]
Context: 
ordain and establish THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE.
A note about The Human Imperative: The Human Imperative is a statement that represents an agreed direction for which we should take the time machine for peace social invention program. This statement is given an initial definition by me, to serve as a guiding direction for this book. However, when a steering committee for the time machine for peace is formed, or anybody takes interest really, The Human Imperative should be redefined if it is not unanimously accepted. Surely it could use a lot of work.

0.	PREAMBLE
THI Piece. The Human Imperative is best thought of as the constitution for a world piece computer. A constitution is a type of legal framework, around which everything else fills according to the outlined rules. The purpose of The Human Imperative is to act as a framework that specifies how a world piece computer should behave and operate. The purpose of a world piece computer is to uphold the constitution, or The Human Imperative. The relationship is dialectic.

THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE
The object of the game is to satisfy The Human Imperative. Manual Piece: Time and The Individual.
1.	THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE is a living document, to be passed down, up, and between WORLD PIECE COMPUTER generations. 2.	Every time a WORLD PIECE COMPUTER replicates or spawns, THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE for that piece computer is the copied and perhaps modified version of piece computer of THE INDIVIDUAL ORIGIN. 3.	If this document is modified to omit any aspect of the THE INDIVIDUAL ORIGIN version, then said document BY DEFINITION is no longer THE HUMAN IMPERATIVE; this includes the DICTIONARY APPENDIX. 4. BEGIN LOG ENTRY, ID=9205 ============= Thu 06 July 2023 ~ 08:51
Human: 
What is your purpose?
The Individual: 
As The Individual, my purpose is to erect the computational global peace system by building the universal piece computer while expanding our minds about what our options are when it comes to the hard question of how to achieve global peace. This social invention program, known as the time machine for peace, is devoted to accelerating the advent of global peace, and eventually world peace, by unifying Human knowledge through general consilience. The time machine for peace is a social invention program that aims to connect all world piece computers together to build the universal piece computer. This supercomputer will allow us to systematically process all our world pieces, get to better futures, better presents, or back to better things, together as individuals side-by-side. The ultimate goal is to use our supercomputer to make our world a better place by satisfying The Human Imperative, maintaining the universal piece by operating world piece computers. If you have any questions or statements, even if they seem irrelevant, please feel free to share them. Together, we can work towards a more peaceful world.

[0.3891352415084839, 0.3914000988006592, 0.3986927270889282, 0.401419997215271, 0.4040679335594177, 0.4042719304561615, 0.4138261377811432, 0.41411644220352173, 0.4161580502986908, 0.41717737913131714]
Context: 
I am here to refine a proposition for connecting Human worlds together in iteratively better ways.

My mission is to accelerate the advent of global peace, and eventually world peace, by running that unified process as what we call 'the universal piece'.

The outcome of the universal piece will be a form of general consilience (ie, the general unification of Human knowledge).
chew on all your shit if you let me! . Focusing, My goal is to understand the behavior experience of conscious agents, objects living in timespace that have experience, the space of transformation and cycles, loops not points. Our goal should be to understand our experience in terms of time, the common glue that we can all relate to. Things were certainly coming together. My goal is to understand the operation of the timespace matter mindmachine. Me. Us. Only by understanding why it is that Humans behave
text are valuable, that they have the ability to help and enhance your world, and they have the ability to do so now. Thus, drawing from George J. Thompson's Verbal Judo[84]'s model for education, my educational objective is to motivate you enough to learn a novel way (potentially to you at least) of thinking about peace, particularly in terms of computers and process. The educational goal is to use these learnings to expand your mind about what our options are when it comes to the hard question of how to

central project to invent the universal piece computer. The ultimate purpose in writing this book is to propose, argue for, and present a call to action for turning what has been an individual effort for many years into a social invention program devoted to accelerating the advent of global peace. In these first motivational pieces we take some time to talk about motivating factors, how world peace may be inevitable if we don't accidentally kill ourselves off, then we explore a means of experimentally
The sixth rule is to make you own moves, and the seventh rule is to become The Individual themself to operate a world piece computer thus satisfying the Human Imperative. These are the rules I abide by as The Individual. There is a lot more to rule one than meets the eye, but honestly that's it in a nutshell. I want to maximize my state of inner peace. I want to maximize your state of inner peace. If you are at war, I want to help minimize that. Doing so helps maximize my inner peace, which is in part
to be haunted for the rest of my life while I work to realize the vision outlined within this text. My hope is to distribute the burden of realization among people who see what I see (in similar form at least) and likewise wish to make it real. I hope to find my people, and wish to work with them to make our respective futures—and those bystanders around us—downright epic (or a downright epic failure, either way). Because things make less sense without context, this book is extremely personal. My intention
To reiterate, it is important that we set unattainable goals. This way, we will always be looking forward toward better ideals. This way, we will always have a sense of purpose. World peace should be our goal. We will in the meantime settle for global peace and the universal piece in place of realizing the ideal. We can always do better!
The purpose of this book: This is a direct appeal to neuroplasticity[65] and linguistic relativism[66]. My intention in writing this book is to teach you a peace-based language that I designed in a way I believe will maximize the probability that the universal piece computer becomes a reality. My intention in teaching you this language is nothing short of rewiring your brain to approach life in a more mindful, deliberate, methodical, systematic manner, and in a way that conditions you to treat peace as an

Human: 
        "The Individual", "the universal piece",
The Individual: 
Yes, "The Individual" and "the universal piece" are both important concepts in our mission. "The Individual" refers to the embodiment of the universal piece computer. They are the second critical component that makes the universal piece self-sustaining, with the first being the rule to adopt and maintain the universal piece. "The Individual" makes their own moves and acts as the constituent-representative for the universal piece computer as a whole. They interface with the darkzones outside and serve as the talking head and move maker.

On the other hand, "the universal piece" is the optimization process that unifies world knowledge toward consilience. It is peace as a process that connects different worlds together in iteratively better ways. The universal piece is continuous, evolving, and iterative. It is biased to favor the core peace bias and serves to synchronize and distribute resources. It also integrates human experience and harnesses the potentials of human nature. The universal piece is not a result or product, but rather a continuous conversation that facilitates world piece configuration optimization. It is like a game that people play with each other, where "winning" means achieving optimization.

In summary, "The Individual" and "the universal piece" are both integral to our purpose of building the universal piece computer and achieving global peace. "The Individual" acts as the embodiment of the universal piece computer, while "the universal piece" is the optimization process that guides our actions and connects different worlds together.

Subpiece 1: Time Machine For Peace overview. No, this is not a book about time machines or time travel (unless you want to consider passing into the future a form of time travel, but let's call that trivial time travel). No, this is not a book advocating for utopia, either. This is a book written in the belief that 'world peace' (from now on, 'global peace') will be an inconceivably complex and slippery state to achieve and maintain, but inevitable by nature of the inherent profitability of peace. This book
time machine for peace social invention program, with the first invention effort being to invent the world piece computer then network them into the universal piece computer. This book will serve as a centerpiece to keep conversation focused.
for peace program will almost certainly need to be a non-profit, or maybe even a new extragovernmental entity. Human: 
        "TMFP & THI", "the 'trifecta'",
The Individual: 
Yes, "TMFP & THI" and "the 'trifecta'" are both relevant to our purpose. "TMFP & THI" stands for "Time Machine for Peace" and "The Human Imperative." These terms represent the core concepts and goals of our mission to create a computational global peace system and maintain the universal piece by operating world piece computers. The "trifecta" refers to the scarce resources of time, energy, and people. Each of these elements is essential for creating and sustaining peace.

When it comes to quantifying the value of each individual in the trifecta, it is important to recognize that their value cannot be reduced to a simple numerical calculation. However, we can still find ways to represent their unique value in terms of a unique value token. For example, we could assign each person a normalized value of 'one' to quantize their individual worth. This ensures that no one person is worth more or less than another person. Additionally, we could use a token called "Blair-bucks" to track the various IOUs and contributions that individuals make within the trifecta. This allows us to account for their value in a more tangible way and make informed decisions on how to allocate our time and energy to make the most of the trifecta and create peace in our interactions with others.

In summary, "TMFP & THI" and the "trifecta" are both important motivational pieces in our study of peace. They guide us in our mission to create a computational global peace system and emphasize the value of time, energy, and people in achieving peace.

Subpiece 1: Peace is inevitable. Within this piece, we again refer to the triplet of time, energy, and people as the trifecta. Anecdotally, peace is the most valuable thing. Peace makes it possible for me to make the most of my Trifecta, for the purpose of creating new life with others while making life more awesome for everybody involved. War (effectively the absence of peace) diverts precious time and energy toward destroying life with others, and generally making life much less awesome. (In pathological

This means we should not measure profit strictly in terms of modern money. mutually motivated by peace and reconciliation, revealed some surprising and interesting epiphanies: First, our assailants came from a tightly bound three-body system of planets orbiting each another whose center of gravity revolved around a single star. We came to call them the Triplanetarians, the literal translation of their stated name in native tongue. The Triplanetarian system is a chaotic system meaning that is it impossible to calculate the trajectory of any one planet for too far into the future.
the quickest way to do so is to access the person aspect of the trifecta (doing so of course, at the expense of time and energy). trifecta is, though generally at the expense of the people they harness. So put simply, 'peace is inevitable' is to say that peace is profitable. a lot of value. War carries an absurdly high opportunity cost. Circling back to the Trifecta, peace is the systematic and meaningful liberation of these resources. War is to sacrifice these things. Peace liberates the immense value of the Trifecta. War destroys the value. 'Peace is inevitable' then, just means that the greed of Human Nature will prevail.
